name: Here (Phillip J Rhoades)
description:
Nothing Good Ever Happens Here!

Desolate, hopeless, horror genre... in poetic form with a choose-your-path spin. Each passage is a tanka style poem.

You live here, in a gray world where nothing good ever happens. Explore the desolate landscape, find mysteries and monsters, but never find a way to escape.

13 Dire Endings!

The IFID for this story is A3658A89-A4E2-43CC-9FC9-D6D61696D65B. (What's an IFID?)
